remarks:
Deduce conjunction of the consequents of two implications ("join consequents with 'and'").  Equivalent to the natural deduction rule ` /\ ` I ( ` /\ ` introduction), see ~ natded .  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Oct-2012.) 

---

 Deduce conjunction of the consequents of two implications ("join consequents with 'and'").  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 25-Oct-2012.)
statement:
jca.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
jca.2 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
jca $p |- ( ph -> ( ps /\ ch ) ) $.
